form.label: NX - Analysis
form.description: Analysis Dashboard for FireEye NX Events

search.query: eventtype=fe product="Web MPS" $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval signature=coalesce (signature, sig_name)| eval Ack=if(isnull('alert.ack'),"",'alert.ack') | search Ack=$ackstatus$ | eval UrlHash=case (category=="malware-object",file_hash, category=="web-infection", objURL, category=="malware-callback" OR category=="domain-match",infURL)| sort -occurred | table Ack, category, id, signature, severity, occurred, transport, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, UrlHash | rename category AS Type, id AS ID, signature AS Malware, severity AS Severity, occurred AS Occurred, transport AS Protocol, src_ip AS "Source IP", src_port AS "Source Port", dest_ip AS "Target IP", dest_port AS "Target Port", UrlHash AS "URL/Md5sum", locations as "Location"

eventtype=fe product="Web MPS" id=$ID$ $wild$ | lookup acknotes id as id | eval UrlHash=case (category=="malware-object",file_hash, category=="web-infection", objURL, category=="malware-callback" OR category=="domain-match",infURL) | eval Notes=if(isnull('Notes'), "Empty", 'Notes') | table Notes, UrlHash, ext_ref | rename Notes as "Event Notes", ext_ref AS "Event Link"

eventtype=fe product="Web MPS" category="malware-callback" $wild$ | eval locations=if(isnull('alert.locations'),"",'alert.locations') | stats count(infURL) as "Events", distinct_count(src_ip) as "Hosts", max(occurred) as "Last Seen" by infURL,locations | rename infURL as "C&C Server", locations as "Locations" | sort ."Last Seen"
